BBS_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS (BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_WRITER, BBS_REG_DATE) VALUES (BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{bbsTitle},#{bbsContent},#{bbsWriter},SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE BBS SET BBS_TITLE=#{bbsTitle}, BBS_CONTENT=#{bbsContent} WHERE BBS_NO=#{bbsNo}
